Title: White Hat/Black Hat
Writer: Dan Lyons, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Carson Mell (executive story editor), Amy Aniobi (story editor), Dan Lyons (staff writer)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: Richard accidentally sparks a feud that leads him to become paranoid about security.
